meanings.definition: To make colorless or remove color.
meanings.sent1: I will achromatize this painting by removing all the colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to achromatize the photo to create a black and white effect.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally achromatized my wardrobe by washing a red sock with my white clothes.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds achromatized the sky, turning it a dull gray.
meanings.sent5: The magician's spell seemed to achromatize everything it touched, draining the world of color.
